## Load packages 

```{r setup}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(magrittr)
```

## dplyr

Let's check the dplyr documentation:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
?dplyr::`dplyr-package`

path <- system.file("doc", "dplyr.html", package = "dplyr")
browseURL(paste("file://", path, sep = ""))

```
